name: Plutonium T6 â€“ Zombies & Multiplayer (Linux/Wine)
author: ajeastt
description: Runs a Plutonium T6 (BO2 Zombies or Multiplayer) server on Linux using Wine. Uses ajeastt/PluotoniumServerLinux with install_panel.sh and T6_zm_server_panel.sh / T6_mp_server_panel.sh based on GAME_MODE.
startup: cd /home/container/PluotoniumServerLinux/Plutonium && if [ "${GAME_MODE}" = "t6mp" ]; then bash T6_mp_server_panel.sh; else bash T6_zm_server_panel.sh; fi

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Plutonium T6 (ZM + MP) installer for panel (Pterodactyl / Calagopus)
set -euo pipefail

apt update -y
apt install -y curl wget git ca-certificates

cd /mnt/server

echo "[Installer] Cloning PluotoniumServerLinux..."
if [ ! -d "PluotoniumServerLinux" ]; then
  git clone https://github.com/ajeastt/PluotoniumServerLinux.git
fi

cd PluotoniumServerLinux
chmod +x install_panel.sh || true
chmod +x Plutonium/T6_zm_server_panel.sh || true
chmod +x Plutonium/T6_mp_server_panel.sh || true

echo "[Installer] Running install_panel.sh..."
bash install_panel.sh

echo "[Installer] Done. Upload your BO2 files into the T6Gamefiles directory if needed."

variables.name: Server Port
variables.description: UDP port the Plutonium T6 server will listen on. (ZM default 4977, MP default 4976).

variables.name: Server Name
variables.description: Name shown in logs / console title for this T6 server.

variables.name: Game Files Path
variables.description: Path to BO2/T6 game files. Leave default unless you know what you are doing.

variables.name: Server Config
variables.description: Dedicated config file executed on start (relative to game path). Example: dedicated_zm.cfg or dedicated.cfg

variables.name: Game Mode
variables.description: Game mode passed to plutonium-bootstrapper. Use t6zm for Zombies or t6mp for Multiplayer.
